title: [K-12] Protocol and Reflection-Based Instructional Design for Integrating Indigenous Perspectives in Digital Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Experience using fundamental digital learning tools and general understanding of multicultural education
context.additional_context: Non-degree adult learners aiming to integrate Indigenous cultural values into language education. Blended learning environments combining digital device utilization and face-to-face workshops

learning_goals: Learners can apply three Indigenous cultural protocols when designing digital learning modules.
Learners can identify two cultural biases in digital learning content through critical reflection and propose improvement strategies.
Learners can create presentation materials for co-designed digital learning scenarios with Indigenous communities using collaboration tools (e.g., Google Jamboard).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
